message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value and the potential it holds, I am offering it to you for $12000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the unique value and features that make this product stand out. I am confident that you will find this investment worthwhile, considering its worth to you is $10000. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information to make a decision.
